title: Eikonal 2.0: General Solutions for Modified Eikonal Equations
abstract:
We find implicit general solutions for modified eikonal equations $u_a
u_a=F(u_t)$, where lower indices at dependent variables designate derivatives,
$a=1,2,..,n$, and summation is implied over the repeated indices. We will
consider the general solutions and symmetries of these equations.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
